title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:
00:05 <@sdumitriu> jamest: It's a configuration issue, it is possible to have LDAP users by default appear in the XWikiAllGroup  
00:05 <@sdumitriu> But I'm not familiar with the LDAP configuration  
00:06 <jamest> ok, i must have missed it in the xwiki.cfg file  
00:15 <DrLou> has quit  
00:40 <@sdumitriu> http://code.google.com/p/google-js-test/

20:59 <vmassol> must be a bot restoring it, we need to fix that  
21:00 <vmassol> (ie request a right to restore a doc from the recycle bin)  
21:11 <+sburjan`> someone is restoring that ?  
21:11 <+sburjan`> and the bot sees your username doing that ?
